name: atomize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change a liquid, or to be changed, into very small drops: Traditional snow guns use compressed air to atomize the water into droplets. The substance atomizes, like mist from a perfume bottle.
to divide something or to be divided into small separate parts: His lawyers will try to pick the case apart, to atomize it and reduce it to merely a series of small technicalities. If this trend continues, there is a risk that the whole sector will atomize.
